instructions.1: Mix cookie dough as directed on package. Spread in bottom of ungreased 13x9-inch pan.
instructions.2: Bake at 350 degrees F for 12 to 15 minutes or until light golden brown; cool.
instructions.3: Microwave 1 cup chocolate chips uncovered on High 1 to 2 minutes or until melted. In a bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Add melted chocolate to cream cheese; blend. Beat 1 cup whipping cream until stiff peaks form. Fold whipping cream into chocolate-cream cheese mixture until well blended. Spread over cooled cookie base. Cover; refrigerate 1 hour or until set.
instructions.4: Microwave 1 cup chocolate chips uncovered on High 1 to 2 minutes or until melted. Stir in 1/2 cup whipping cream until blended. Spoon warm chocolate mixture over mousse; spread evenly. Refrigerate 30 minutes or until set. Store tightly covered in refrigerator.

questions.question: Is cookie dough from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is stiff peaks live after Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
Can we mix (Step 1) and bake (Step 2) at the same time?
